name: Spiced Fruit and Nut Christmas Cake. Eggless Vegan Recipe
description: Spiced Fruit and Nut Christmas Cake. Eggless Vegan Recipe. Fruit Cake, Rum Cake, Plum Cake, Rum Cake or holiday cake. Makes 1 9 inch cake pan
recipeIngredient: 1.75 cups cups of Spelt flour  (Or use 1.25 cups whole wheat flour and 1/2 cup all purpose flour)
3/4 cup ground raw sugar (or demerara sugar or vegan brown sugar)
1/4 teaspoon each of cinnamon, clove, nutmeg powders
1/3 cup Coconut oil or oil of choice
1/2 teaspoon rum extract (if not using liquor. optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak chopped fruits and nuts in juice or a combination of juice and liquor overnight or atleast 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak chopped fruits and nuts in juice or a combination of juice and liquor overnight or atleast 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, Mix all the dry ingredients and spices for the cake.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, Mix all the dry ingredients and spices for the cake.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix in all the wet and the soaked fruits and nuts. Depending on how long the fruits have been kept, there may or may not be extra liquid left.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix in all the wet and the soaked fruits and nuts. Depending on how long the fruits have been kept, there may or may not be extra liquid left.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the wet to the dry and mix till just about combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the wet to the dry and mix till just about combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 minutes then lower the heat to 350 degrees F and bake for another 10-20 minutes till a toothpick test from the center comes out almost clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 minutes then lower the heat to 350 degrees F and bake for another 10-20 minutes till a toothpick test from the center comes out almost clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely before slicing. Tastes best the next day.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely before slicing. Tastes best the next day.
